name: No Name (Thomas Piazzalunga)
description:
No Name is a game developed in 8 days, entirely by me using Unity3D.

The main idea came from the character, a model that would have filled the role: archer in a personal project, simple gameplay, a small archery with the aim of taking down the targets scattered on the side of the map.

The game includes 3 small missions:

1) Eliminate 4 targets (close)

2) Eliminate 2 targets (far)

3) Reach 100 points;

Complete the missions and interacting with Layla you can decide whether to close the game or continue indefinitely by shooting down the various targets, which once "defeated" will reappear after a period of time.

I hope you enjoy this little project, despite some bugs / shortcomings due to my knowledge and experience.
